THE UNIVERSITY OF WISCONSIN
MADISON 6
SCHOOL OF JOURNALISM
October 26, 1961
Dear Sam:
Thanks for sending; a copy of your talk at Purdue. I. guess you
know I am very much in agreement with the basic thesis, and I
think you stated it wfcll. Will it do any good? Thatâ€™s another

Prof. Samuel L. Becker
